titleStmt.title: Numb[er]. 1. An abstract of some special forreigne occurrences, brought down to the weekly newes, of the 20 of December. Or, The severall passages and novels which have happened in Germany, France, Spaine, Italy, and other places some few moneths since

publicationStmt.publisher: printed [by T. Harper?] for Nathaniel Butter and Nicholas Bourne,

notesStmt.note: Identified as STC 82 on UMI microfilm "Early English books, 1475-1640".
Reproduction of original in: Bodleian Library.
